attributes.additional_details: In 1999 minimum wage was £3.60:hr and a freddo costed 5p. this means you could buy 72 freddos with a one hour wage.. now minimum wage is £7.50/ hr yet freddos are 25p waning you can only buy 30 freddos with a one hour wage. For the continuum of freddo purchasing we need 18/hr MINIMUM
attributes.background: To make the minimum wage £18/hr due to the reasoning below

rejection.details:
We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Increase the minimum wage to £10.00 an hour: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/558514
